name: Apple Panna (sweet and sour apple cooler)
description: Apple Panna is a delicious sweet and sour apple cooler made with fresh apple and spices. The perfect way to start the Summer. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 teaspoon rock salt ((kala namak or chaat masala to taste))
2 teaspoons lemon juice ((less or more for sourness))

recipeInstructions.text: Peel(optional, and I dont mind peel and pulp) and cube the apple and pressure cook with little water for 2-3 whistles. or cook in a covered container with 2 cups of water for half an hour till the apples are are soft and mushy.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel(optional, and I dont mind peel and pulp) and cube the apple and pressure cook with little water for 2-3 whistles. or cook in a covered container with 2 cups of water for half an hour till the apples are are soft and mushy.

recipeInstructions.text: Once cooled, blend the apple in a blender to make puree.
recipeInstructions.name: Once cooled, blend the apple in a blender to make puree.

recipeInstructions.text: Add grated jaggery or sugar, salt, black pepper, rock salt, cumin powder and mint and blend again.
recipeInstructions.name: Add grated jaggery or sugar, salt, black pepper, rock salt, cumin powder and mint and blend again.

recipeInstructions.text: Add lemon juice and more water if needed. Adjust salt and sugar according to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Add lemon juice and more water if needed. Adjust salt and sugar according to taste.

recipeInstructions.text: If the pulp is bothersome, then strain the drink before serving!
recipeInstructions.name: If the pulp is bothersome, then strain the drink before serving!

recipeInstructions.text: Chill and serve with ice cubes!
recipeInstructions.name: Chill and serve with ice cubes!
